titleInfo.title: Plan of subdivision of part of north half of lot 11 and the north half of lot 12 in the Fifth Concession
titleInfo.subTitle: of the Township of Barton

physicalDescription.note: 1 map ; sheet 41 x 61 cm. Map lined with archival paper on verso.

mods.note: Shows 40 numbered land parcels, as well as the location of the "estate of the late Joseph Kirkendall". Streets appearing on the map include: Fifth Concession Road [now Fennell Avenue East], Mountain Drive [now Howe Avenue], South Street [likely 15th Street], Wellington Street [now transitions into Upper Wellington Street], original road allowance between lots 10 and 11 [now Upper Wentworth Street]. Written in top left corner, "No 67 Drawer 3".
